summary: Makes a light and heavy version of all armor types. Added the Steel Plate Shield that was never added with stats consistent with Official Skyrim Guide 28 Armor 14 Weight 325 Value Heavy. Making all armors craftable in the game as well. Added some specialized armors for crafting, like wolf armor or family shield etc etc
descriptionHtml:
Making Light and Heavy Armor versions to be able to play any armor you like as light or heavy. If you like the way Ebony armor looks but want a light variation, you can! Same if you want a heavy version of Elven! Also \"put in\" a Steel Plate Shield that is missing from the game and used the official guide ratings for it as well (will have a light armor version)
Here is the table I am using for armors:

Hide ------- Iron, Ancient Nord
Studded, Fur, Pen OC ------- Banded
Leather, Forsworn ------- Steel, Falmer, Companion
Elven ------- Dwarven
Scale ------- Steel Plate, Orc
Elven Gilded ------- Ebony
Glass ------- Blades
Dragon Scale ------- Dragon Plate
Light Daedric ------- Daedric

each set will have a corresponding type that will have a light and heavy armor to be crafted and tempered 

Just drop this file in your game Data folder and enable

I will be working on every armor in the game in the future, enjoy!
author: michael2mandy
